```{r setup}
library(rtabulator)
```

rtabulator comes with the built-in themes of [Tabulator JS](https://tabulator.info/docs/6.2/theme).

## Standard Themes

* midnight
* modern
* simple
* site

## Framework Themes

* bootstrap3
* bootstrap4
* bootstrap5
* bulma
* materialize
* semanticui

Themes are selected by specifying the `theme` parameter when calling `tabulator()`:

```{r}
tabulator(iris, theme = "midnight")
```
